summary:
Boromir's Sword From The Movie Lord of The Rings.
Craftable,Temperable and Enchantable. Have Fun!
descriptionHtml:
[center]


[color=#dd2423][u][b]I am no longer working on this, feel free to use as you wish[/b][/u][/color]

My First Attempt at Modding skyrim.

Boromir Sword From The Lord of The Rings.

[color=#dd2423][u][b]Features[/b][/u][/color]

Adds a Craftable,Temperable and Enchantable Sword to The Game Based on Boromir's Sword from The Lord Of The Rings.
Named "Sword of Boromir"

[color=#dd2423][u][b]Installation[/b][/u][/color]

Extract Archive into Data Folder
Activate ESP as per Normal

[color=#dd2423][u][b]Location[/b][/u][/color]

It Should be Craftable with Steel Smithing perk

or

Open Console and Type "Help Boromir 4"

Use the Code That appears for "Player.additem xxxxxx 1" with xxxxxx referring to code.

[color=#dd2423][u][b]Damage[/b][/u][/color]

Has Slightly less damage than a Daedric Sword.

[color=#dd2423][u][b]Uninstall[/b][/u][/color]

Delete Boromir Sword.esp In Data
Delete Boromirsword Folder in Datameshesweapons
Delete Boromirsword Folder in Datatexturesweapons

[color=#dd2423][u][b]Bugs[/b][/u][/color]

In Certain Lighting Conditions and View angles the Sword Sometimes appears all White. Texture Problem.

[color=#dd2423][u][b]Tools Used[/b][/u][/color]

Cinema 4D
MudBox 2012
PhotoShop CS5

[color=#dd2423][u][b]Permissions[/b][/u][/color]

[color=#dd2423][u][b]I am no longer working on this, feel free to use as you wish[/b][/u][/color][/center]
author: TheMalfazar

files.name: Boromir Sword V0-2
files.changelogHtml:
Completely Remade Mesh from Scratch with correct Proportions
Slightly Improved Texture
Weapon Hilt has More Detail
Blade has Indent Model detail now, not just a Texture Appearance.
Fixed Missing Texture under Hilt
